participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and friendly, with a passion for sports and fantasy stories.
participant_1.background: I like soccer. My brother used to be in the navy. My favorite food is mashed potatoes. I am a vegan. I love game of thrones.

participant_2.name: Jamie
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, enjoys punk rock culture and has a knack for storytelling through art.
participant_2.background: In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punkrock. I draw comic books. I like dr pepper and black jack gum, but not together. My favorite show is scooby doo. I work in a corner grocery store during the day.

content.text: I love game of thrones! Who's your favorite character?
I love Arya Stark! She's so badass.
I love her too! She's one of my favorites.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play soccer, read, and watch movies.
I like to draw comic books and watch scooby doo.
I love scooby doo! I used to watch it all the time when I was a kid.
Me too! It's still so good.
So, what do you like to draw?
I like to draw my favorite characters from comic books and video games.
That sounds really cool! I wish I could draw.
You can learn! There are lots of great tutorials online.
I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's really fun.
So, what do you do for work?
I work in a corner grocery store during the day, and in the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punkrock.
That sounds like a cool job! I've always wanted to work at a club.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be pretty crazy sometimes.
I can imagine! So, what's your favorite thing about your job?
My favorite thing is getting to meet new people and hear all about their lives.
That sounds really cool! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I do.
